aom.scripting.ui.console

Class Chat

  • Object
    • Chat

  • public class Chat
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of Console commands concerning Chats.
    Author
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void chat(string text, int player)
      Adds a line of chat text from the given player (current if not provided).
      void sendChatToAllies(string message)
      Sends chat to allies.
      void sendChatToEnemies(string message)
      Sends chat to enemies.
      void sendChatToEveryone(string message)
      Sends chat to everyone.
      void sendChatToPlayer(int player, string message)
      Sends chat to given player.
      void sendChatToTeam(int team, string message)
      Sends chat to a team.
      void uiChatScroll(int nbPagesBack)
      Navigates through chat history, resetting mode as needed.
      void uiSendIngameChat()
      Used by the chat input.
      void uiToggleChat()
      Toggles chat visibility.

    • Method Detail

      • uiChatScroll

        public void uiChatScroll(int nbPagesBack)
        Navigates through chat history, resetting mode as needed.
        Local Call

      • chat

        public void chat(string text,
        int player)
        Adds a line of chat text from the given player (current if not provided).
        Local Call
        This text won't be transferred over the network to other players.

      • uiSendIngameChat

        public void uiSendIngameChat()
        Used by the chat input. Sends a message to the currently selected players. This only sends chats the players with the same (alive/defeated/game-over) state.
        Auto Syncs
        Transfers the chat message to all intended recipients.

      • sendChatToEveryone

        public void sendChatToEveryone(string message)
        Sends chat to everyone.
        Auto Syncs
        Transfers the chat message to every player.

      • sendChatToAllies

        public void sendChatToAllies(string message)
        Sends chat to allies.
        Auto Syncs
        Transfers the chat message to all allies.

      • sendChatToEnemies

        public void sendChatToEnemies(string message)
        Sends chat to enemies.
        Auto Syncs
        Transfers the chat message to all enemies.

      • sendChatToPlayer

        public void sendChatToPlayer(int player,
                    string message)
        Sends chat to given player.
        Auto Syncs
        Transfers the chat message to the given player.

      • sendChatToTeam

        public void sendChatToTeam(int team,
                  string message)
        Sends chat to a team.
        Auto Syncs
        Transfers the chat message to the given team.

      • uiToggleChat

        public void uiToggleChat()
        Toggles chat visibility.
